abstract: Spanish advertising agencies have joined forces for an event to acquaint the United States with their work.
snippet: Spanish advertising agencies have joined forces for an event to acquaint the United States with their work.
lead_paragraph: It’s a small world, Walt Disney has been telling visitors to its theme parks for decades. In an effort to further shrink the world of advertising, Spanish agencies have joined forces for an event to acquaint the United States with their work.

headline.main: How Do You Say ‘Madison Avenue’ in Spanish?
